cat.albirar.template.engine.service

Interface ITemplateEngineRegistry

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TemplateEngineRegistryDefaultImpl

    @Validated
public interface ITemplateEngineRegistry
    A template engine registry that collaborate with ITemplateEngineFactory for internal use of template engine classes. The implemented template engines should to register itself with register(ITemplateEngine) method in order to be available on ITemplateEngineFactory.
    Since:
    2.2.0
    Author:
    Octavi Fornés <ofornes@albirar.cat>

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void register(@NotNull @Valid ITemplateEngine templateEngine)
      Register a new templateEngine for use.

    • Method Detail

      • register

        void register(@NotNull @Valid
              @NotNull @Valid ITemplateEngine templateEngine)
        Register a new templateEngine for use. **ATENTION** If another template engine was configured with same template language, this one overwrites the previously registered.
        Parameters:
        templateEngine - The template engine
